message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, and this is a fair price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement within my budget?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is my bottom line.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $17,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Unfortunately, $17,500 is still beyond my budget. I would like to propose $15,000 as a compromise. Would that be acceptable?
